"The Grand Torch Stand/Torch Stands":
"The Grand Torch Stand located within Rayjord Gorge applies the Heat Coating status to players within its area of effect.

While you have the Heat Coating status, all cold weather damage is prevented, and additional Fire-Attribute damage is applied to your attacks.

The Heat Coating status will end after enough time has passed since leaving the area of the Grand Torch Stand."

"You can access a Torch Stand while you have the Heat Coating status to light it, granting it the same effect as the Grand Torch Stand.

Torch Stands eventually go out, but they can be relit by accessing them again while you have Heat Coating."
